about_the_game:
Small Spaces is a relaxing game about turning small apartments into beautifully designed dioramas you'd want to live in. From a simplistic flat in Tokyo to a victorian townhouse in San Francisco. Your only limit is the space itself.

Full creativity

Full creativity with limited space. Sliding doors? Stairs that lead up to your kitchen counter? Find smart solutions and design unique spaces with hundreds of realistic design furniture pieces and materials.

Create beautiful apartments

From a simplistic flat in Tokyo to a victorian townhouse in San Francisco. The variety of spaces spark curiosity and ideas in a way it makes you look forward to the next one – Each level coming with its own challenges and opportunities.

Don’t think, just do!

Sit back and relax. Add indirect lights, plants and more to decorate and personalize your space. Let your ideas flow and create your own cozy world. Small Spaces makes designing fun and easy.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-8100 or AMD Ryzen 3
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1080 or AMD Radeon RX Vega 64
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8600 or AMD Ryzen 5 3600
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 or AMD Radeon RX 5600
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Yes
